name: Jigsaw Photo Puzzle
description:
Relax a little with this cute little puzzle game!

° Adorable and fun photos to choose from.
° Adjustable difficulty. Select how many puzzle pieces you want for each photo.
° Two puzzle pieces display modes.
° Toggle guide image. Helps you complete the puzzle with ease.
° No InApp Purchases or Subscriptions. You buy the game, you enjoy it as much as you want without paying extra.

Get this game and have some relaxing time!
